content: add any texture you like check the stitch count ahead of time and choose a size accordingly the bag cast on i changed to my 4 mm us 6 40 cm / 16 inch if you are increasing/reducing the repeats cable circular needles to work in the round adjust the written numbers accordingly instead of magic loop after two repeats of either options below using 4 mm us g-6 crochet hook and main colour make a magic_ring chain 1 work 6 7 all sizes except m k to bor 8 single_crochet in magic_ring size m kfb k to bor 64 sts 1 st increase option 1 for one cable video tutorial - magic_ring https // round 1 p1 2/2rc p1 k to bor www youtube com/watch v=p298hxgso1s rounds 2-4 p1 k4 p1 k to bor crochet base repeat rounds 1-4 six seven eight times round 1 2sc in each st to bor 12 14 16 option 2 for two cables sts round 1 p1 2/2rc p1 k6 p1 2/2lc p1 k to bor round 2 1sc 2sc in next st to bor 18 21 24 sts rounds 2-4 p1 k4 p1 k6 p1 k4 p1 k to bor round 3 2sc 2sc in next st to bor 24 28 repeat rounds 1-4 six seven eight times 32 sts using 4 mm us 6 dpns or 60 cm / 24 inch add further repeats at this point to add more cable circular needles pick up and knit length around to 1 st before last single_crochet stitch pm to mark bor photo tutorial on the next page tie and bind off knitted base all sizes except m k to bor size m k2tog k to bor 63 sts 1 st decrease round 1 k3 kfb six seven eight times around 30 35 40 sts round 1 yo k2tog k1 to bor size m or if you have an odd st count omit round 2 k4 kfb six seven eight times last k2tog around 36 42 48 sts round 2-3 k1 p1 to bor round 3 k5 kfb six seven eight times around 42 49 56 sts round 4 k to bor round 4 k6 kfb six seven eight times round 5 bind off all stitches using your around 48 56 64 sts favourite method links follow on the next page should you want guidance to reduce circumference you could move on weave in ends make a braided tie thread tie at any point to the bag section into yarn overs photo tutorial on the next page add tie & enjoy page 3 of 5 picking up stitches from crochet bind off youtube links 1 place stitch from crochet hook onto picot bind off - https //www youtube com/ knitting needle watch v=ajojgfwzerc 3 easy bind off methods including traditional - https //www youtube com/ watch v=2mvplcgaplc braided ties i like roughly 24 inch / 60 cm ties but of course do what brings you joy here are two methods for ties 2
